dc.#comment: DualCapture recording using Prism AI App

thermal.description: Heavy fog (thick droplets) at night through residential area. Taken with Tau2 45 HFOV camera in a DualCapture system A (S/N  229502). All frames have corresponding visible video taken with a BlackFly S USB3.

rgb.description: Heavy fog (thick droplets) at night through residential area. Taken with Blackfly S USB3 (BFS-U3-51S5C, IMX250) 55 HFOV in DualCapture system A (S/N  229502). All frames have corresponding thermal video taken with a Tau2.

#description: This description is for the upload batch
